name: UIEvent.EventType
desc: Specifies the general type of an event

items.name: case touches
items.desc: The event is related to touches on the screen.

items.name: case motion
items.desc: The event is related to motion of the device, such as when the user shakes it.

items.name: case remoteControl
items.desc: The event is a remote-control event. Remote-control events originate as commands received from a headset or external accessory for the purposes of controlling multimedia on the device.

items.name: case presses
items.desc: The event is related to the press of a physical button.
